welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Santa Barbara, Guatemala! Surrounded by breathtaking mountains and known for its vibrant culture and delicious coffee, we invite you to explore our charming city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer."

restaurants.name: Restaurant "El Remanso"
restaurants.description: Restaurant "El Remanso" is a restaurant located in Santa Bárbara.
restaurants.address: Carretera Nacional, Vía Aguasay, Santa Barbara 6201, Estado Monagas

restaurants.name: Ouro Brasil Churrasqueria
restaurants.description: Ouro Brasil Churrasqueria is a brazilian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: El Toro Real
restaurants.description: El Toro Real is a restaurant located in Punta de Mata.
restaurants.address: Punta de Mata, Estado Maturín , Estado Monagas

restaurants.name: El rincón de rosa
restaurants.description: El rincón de rosa is a fast food restaurant located in Punta de Mata.

restaurants.name: Bar Restaurant China Oriente
restaurants.description: Bar Restaurant China Oriente is a chinese restaurant located in Punta de Mata.
restaurants.address: Cerca Del Terminal De Pasajeros (Frente Restautant Cavernas Club), Punta De Mata , Estado Monagas

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Huehuetenango Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
